website_summaries.verdict: Specially created for speedy runners, the New Balance 1500 T2 Boa is designed to provide a responsive and efficient ride. This road running shoe is manufactured with mild stability features to accommodate runners and athletes who need some support. It is made up of quality materials that deliver maximum breathability, durability, and comfort.
pros: The New Balance 1500 T2 Boa is lightweight, based on reviews
Many users appreciated the comfort level of this shoe
This shoe is supportive, some users claimed
It offers a snug fit, according to a few commenters
This shoe is perfect for quick runs and workouts, said some wearers
Several consumers love how this shoe tightens easily
cons: A couple of runners said that the upper material rubs against the foot, causing discomfort
One tester complained that upper fabric makes the shoe hard to run in

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Comfortable. I wear mine to work. I work in a hospital and am on my feet for 12 hours a day. Work great. Everyone compliments the bright fun color.
customer_reviews.author: SAMM

customer_reviews.title: These fit great for (very) wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These fit great for (very) wide feet, and are durable. My wife does multiple types of workouts throughout the week (from walking to weightlifting to cardio) and they hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Can run 3 miles with no pain! Perfect if you have wide feet and I always get compliments with them! Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for running or long walks
customer_reviews.text: The shoe lacks good cushioning so would only recommend for short walks or cycling
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Tweedy

customer_reviews.title: SAME SIZE AS OTHER NEW BALANCE I HAVE PURCHASED IN ...
customer_reviews.text: SAME SIZE AS OTHER NEW BALANCE I HAVE PURCHASED IN THE PAST, BUT FOR SOME REASON THESE RAN SMALL WIDTH WISE.
customer_reviews.author: dinderella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: favorite running shoes ever. tried the new version of the W1500, but prefer v2. Better fit/feel
customer_reviews.author: Karen Entrekin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light, breathable and comfortable for all day wear and exercise. I stand all day on concrete floors at work and these shoes have kept my feet and legs from being sore. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Krispie

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 12b, but was still a little narrow. All my other NB are 12b. May be because the style was different.
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Color, I ordered a size 8 but should have ordered a 9; I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and light, but toe box is shortened
customer_reviews.text: I love how these shoes look, and how light they are. Sad to say, I had to return them! I normally wear an 8.5 W. But the toe box on this particular style is shorter than normal and a bit narrower, so my toes were crowded and right against the end of the shoe. I should have ordered a 9.0 W. Unfortunately, that size isn’t in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like the shoe but I need a wider arch base to put in my orthotic
customer_reviews.author: Darmecia Mckay

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's 1500 V6 Boa Wettkampfschuh Damen-Koralle, Pink Running Competition Shoe
product_meta.description: New Balance 1500T2 Running Shoes Built for speed seekers, the new 1500T2 runner brings a fresh look to this classic series. Made with a breathable, lightweight upper featuring a Boa Fit System this shoe offers support and displays a race day-inspired design. Underfoot, a newly formulated REVlite midsole that's designed for a quicker rebound, offering the long-haul support needed from 5K to 26.2. FantomFit Skeletally Engineered Upper The New Balance 1500T2 Running Shoe are the perfect race day essential whether you are running a half marathon or a traithlon, these running shoes are highly versatile for all your running needs. A perforated synthetic mesh upper envelopes your foot in breathability, allowing cool air to circulate to keep you feeling cool and comfortable. Created by fusing two thin materials with a no-sew process the lack of seams and smooth transition of materials generates a comfortable, irritation free fit that fits securely around the foot, without the distraction of rubbing seams digging into the skin so you can focus on the road ahead. The Meta-Lock midfoot wrap creates a snug fit by hugging your foot in place without restricting movement. The slip on style bootie construction offers a stabilising, secure fit with easy on/off assist through the addition of heel tabs - perfect for slipping on and off during a triathlon race or for throwing on for a quick jog around the park. A streamline design works to slice through the air with every step reducing drag for fast footing. Finished with a Boa closure system, the New Balance 1500T2 Running Shoe allows an adjustable, customised fitting midfoot that locks down on the fly so you feel locked in and secure all run long. REVlite Midsole Constructed using New Balance's developed REVlite midsole, this provides the shoe with premium responsiveness and durability. When you start to move, the REVlite will spring into action, providing you with an extremely responsive boost. It is also extremely dura
feature_bullets: Perforated Synthetic Mesh Upper- Breathable mesh upper that allows cool air to circulate.
No Sew Process- Comfortable, irritation free fit.
Meta Lock Midfoot Wrap- Secures your foot in place without restricting movement.
Slip On Bootie Construction- Offers a stabilised, secure fit and easy on/off with added heel tabs.
Streamline Design- Reduces drag for fast footing.
